gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Security & Master Data Foundation
criteria: All security groups and base ACLs implemented. Unit test coverage for role assignment logic > 80%. No critical SonarQube issues.
success_metrics: User roles are correctly assigned and enforced at the model level.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Trip & Security Hardening
criteria: Driver record rule integration tests passing. Trip creation validations are fully unit tested. Field-level security manually verified for all roles.
success_metrics: Demonstrable data segregation for Driver role. Trip creation is robust.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: RBAC & S3 Sign-off
criteria: 100% completion of manual RBAC test matrix with no outstanding critical/high bugs. S3 integration is fully functional for document uploads and downloads.
success_metrics: QA sign-off on the entire RBAC implementation. All document management features are working.

gate_name: Sprint 4 Quality Gate: Driver Portal MVP
criteria: Driver login and trip list features are fully functional and pass E2E tests on both iOS and Android mobile viewports. Accessibility checks (Axe) show no critical violations.
bypass_criteria: Only minor, non-blocking UI issues are acceptable.
success_metrics: Successful E2E demo of a driver logging in and viewing their trips on a mobile device.
